summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 JEEP CHEROKEE. WHILE DRIVING VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE GEAR SHIFTER INDICATOR ILLUMINATED AND THE EMERGENCY BRAKE ENGAGED INDEPENDENTLY. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN UNKNOWN DEALER WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE TIED WIRE HARNESS WAS HANGING FROM THE VEHICLE. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED; HOWEVER, THE FAILURE RECURRED SEVERAL TIMES. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND ADVISED THE CONTACT TO GET A RENTAL VEHICLE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 74,000. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE. *LN  CONSUMER STATED COMPLETE GEAR SHIFT FAILURE, ENTIRE SHIFT COLUMN WOULD LIGHT UP AND CAR EMERGENCY BRAKE WOULD ENGAGE.  UPDATED 7/27/18*JB
